resources.string: This app uses a new feature of Android Oreo called push-notifications. As a result of which the song control panel of the notification bar pops up when any changes are made to the song playback. For eg. next song is played or the song is paused so that you can change the song, play/pause while working on other apps without the hassle of opening the Echo app again or pulling down the notification panel to do the same.
However some users might find it a bit irritating or a distraction. Hence they can always change that behavior by modifying the notification setting of the app by following the given steps :
Open the Settings app and go to Apps & Notifications (or equivalent settings if you are running a custom UI) and open Notifications. Click on Echo in the list
Tap on Importance (which would be set to urgent by default)
Select High from the list Now Restart the app for the changes to take place
